name: Bump in The Night II - Halloween 2025
author: Q Smith

name: Spirit
otherNightReminder: If the Spirit was executed: The Spirit points to a player, they are drunk until dawn
ability: Each night, if you died by execution, choose a player (different to last night), they are drunk until dawn.

name: Angel
otherNightReminder: The Angel points to a player: if they died tonight, the angel dies instead. Wake the chosen player, show them the 'This character selected you' card, then show them the Angel token and point to the Angel player
ability: Each night*, choose a player: If they would die tonight, you die instead and they learn your role.

name: Ghost Hunter
otherNightReminder: If the Ghost Hunter died tonight from the Demon: Point to 3 different players, then show the currently in play Demon Role
ability: If the Demon kills you, you are woken and learn the Demon’s role and 1 of 3 players who could be the Demon

name: Skeleton
otherNightReminder: If it is Night 2, the Skeleton dies. If no players died the previous day, the Skeleton is resurrected.
ability: On night 2, you die. Once you have died: once per game, if nobody died the previous day you are resurrected.

name: Revenant
firstNightReminder: Wake the Revenant, point to the player marked "Marked" and show the Revenant their role
ability: You start knowing a townsfolk player's role. When you are executed, whoever nominated you is poisoned and may die at any time.

name: Graverobber
firstNightReminder: The Graverobber chooses a player: They are poisoned and may register as any character tonight.
otherNightReminder: The Graverobber chooses a player: They are poisoned and may register as any character tonight.
ability: Each night choose a player: They are poisoned and may register as any character tonight.

name: Necromancer
otherNightReminder: The Necromancer may point to a player: that player dies, or The Necromancer can make a clawed hand gesture, then point to a player: that player's ability now works as though they hadn't died
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Once per game, choose a dead player: their ability now functions as though they hadn’t died.
